thread.title: Twitter Guesses Beyoncé & Jay Z's Twins' Names
thread.title_full: Twitter Guesses Beyoncé & Jay Z's Twins' Names

author: Chris Mitchell
title: Twitter Guesses Beyoncé & Jay Z's Twins' Names

organizations.name: twitter guesses beyoncé & jay z's twins

text:
0 
No one at HipHopDX won the office pool when Beyoncé and Jay Z named their first child Blue Ivy in 2012. But now with the news that Hip Hop’s royal couple is having twins , we’ll have double the chances to guess the names correctly. 
Seeing as how we haven’t yet been told what the names will be by the Beyoncé oracle on Twitter , instead we asked our own followers to give us some ideas. 
Here are some of the best ones they came up with. @HipHopDX Meridian and Periwinkle 
— J Mag (@_j_mag) February 1, 2017 Pink Ivy and White Ivy https://t.co/6zKU7nR4JA 
— Troy Mesh. (@olaoluwatroy) February 1, 2017 Un/Deux/Royal Harvest/Griot Belle/Odyssey/FelaFunk/Kuti Kick/Tidal Beats/Pop’n Rose/Jam’n/Jam’n/Jamba Jam’n/Jazz'n Free/Bey Zen/Brouillage https://t.co/LBVxXGbfOL 
— James Dinverno (@DinvernoDesign) February 1, 2017 @HipHopDX Kale Kick/Swan Boom/Bloom/Bloom/Bey-Zen/Kamin-yu/Tamano-yu/Bushido Bloom… 
— James Dinverno (@DinvernoDesign) February 1, 2017 @HipHopDX Kelly and Michelle
